22  class RecordActionServer {
23  //private members
24  ros::NodeHandle _nh;
25  ros::Subscriber _sub;
26  actionlib::SimpleActionServer<pumpkin_messages::RecordAction> _server;
27  YAML::Node _node;
28  std::ofstream _file;
29  unsigned int _count;
30  ros::Time _start;
31  double _max_time;
32  bool _first_move;
33  bool _verbose;
34  pumpkin_messages::RecordFeedback _feedback;
35  pumpkin_messages::RecordResult _result;
36 
37  public:
42  RecordActionServer(bool setVerbose = false) : _server(_nh, "/pumpkin/recorder_action", false),
43  _verbose(setVerbose) {
44  _server.registerGoalCallback(boost::bind(&RecordActionServer::onGoal, this));
45  _server.registerPreemptCallback(boost::bind(&RecordActionServer::onPreempt, this));
46 
47  _sub = _nh.subscribe("/a_reads", 1000, &RecordActionServer::onRead, this);
48  _server.start();
49  }
50 
55  ~RecordActionServer() {
56  _sub.shutdown();
57  if (_file.is_open())
58  _file.close();
59  _server.shutdown();
60  }

68  void onGoal();
69 
76  void onPreempt();
77 
88  void onRead(const pumpkin_messages::analog_arrayConstPtr &msg);
89  };
90 
91  /*
92  * Closes the file and set the server as preempted.
93  * (Finishing the job)
94  */
95  void RecordActionServer::onPreempt() {
96  //_file << "---" << std::endl;
97  _file.close();
98  _server.setPreempted();
99  ROS_WARN("Preempted file.");
100  }
101 
102  /*
103  * This function uses quite a decorated way.
104  * It accept the goal, open the file, and adjust the object to start recording.
105  * If the file could not be created, or opened, the movement is not recorded, and an error message
106  * is sent to the caller.
107  */
108  void RecordActionServer::onGoal() {
109  if (_file.is_open())
110  _file.close();
111  _count = 0;
112  auto goal = _server.acceptNewGoal();
113  std::string filename = goal->filename;
114  _max_time = goal->max_time;
115  if (filename.empty()) {
116  std::ostringstream s;
117  s << "raw_" << std::time(nullptr) << ".yaml";
118  filename = s.str();
119  }
120  _file.open(filename.c_str(), std::fstream::out | std::fstream::trunc);
121  _start = ros::Time::now();
122  if (!_file.is_open()) {
123  _result.time_elapsed = 0.0;
124  _result.num_steps = 0;
125  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::ErrorOpening);
126  _server.setAborted(_result);
127  }
128  _first_move = true;
129  ROS_INFO("Starting recording...");
130  }
131 
132  /*
133  * This is where the magic happens.
134  * See the doxygen comment above to understand.
135  */
136  void RecordActionServer::onRead(const pumpkin_messages::analog_arrayConstPtr &msg) {
137  if (!_server.isActive())
138  return;
139 
140  //If the not the first move, create the separator
141  if (!_first_move) {
142  _file << "---" << std::endl;
143  } else {
144  _first_move = false;
145  }
146 
147  //If the verbose, print the message
148  //Be adviced. This is A LOT OF INFORMATION
149  if (_verbose) {
150  std::cout << msg << std::endl;
151  }
152 
153  //If it is first time, it will create the YAML structure
154  //Otherwise, it will just overwrite the data in the structure
155  _node["header"]["seq"] = msg->header.seq;
156  _node["header"]["stamp"]["secs"] = msg->header.stamp.sec;
157  _node["header"]["stamp"]["nsecs"] = msg->header.stamp.nsec; // node["seq"] automatically becomes a sequence
158  _node["header"]["frame_id"] = msg->header.frame_id;
159  for (int i = 0; i < msg->an_read.size(); i++)
160  _node["an_read"][i] = msg->an_read[i];
161 
162  //Prints the node
163  _file << _node << std::endl;
164 
165  //Fill up the feedback message, and send
166  _feedback.num_steps = ++_count;
167  _feedback.time_elapsed = (ros::Time::now() - _start).toSec();
168  _server.publishFeedback(_feedback);
169 
170  //Error file
171  if (!_file.good()) {
172  _result.num_steps = _feedback.num_steps;
173  _result.time_elapsed = _feedback.time_elapsed;
174  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(_file.eof() ? IOState::EndOfFile : IOState::BadFile);
175  _server.setAborted(_result);
176  _file.close();
177  ROS_ERROR("File error");
178  return;
179  }
180 
181  //Movement finished
182  if (_feedback.time_elapsed >= _max_time) {
183  _result.time_elapsed = _feedback.time_elapsed;
184  _result.num_steps = _feedback.num_steps;
185  _result.state = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::OK);
186  _server.setSucceeded(_result);
187  _file.close();
188  ROS_INFO("Record successfull.");
189  return;
190  }
191  }
192 }

218 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
219 
220  ros::init(argc, argv, "recorder");
221  ros::start();
222 
223  pumpkin::RecordActionServer server;
224 
225  ros::spin();
226 
227  ros::shutdown();
228 
229  return 0;
230 }
